name: - Ancient tools for ceremony and prayer (Nepal series #22) -
description:
The drum on the right is used for ceremonies. 
Prayers were carved into the wooden boards that are laying on top of each other in the cabinet. They were used for prayers before the introduction of paper. 
The wooden skulls are said to keep away evil spirits.
I was also impressed with the ancient wallpainting.

This picture was taken in an ancient Buddhist temple in the village of Kyanjin Gumba.

5616px X 3744px
